/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades painted in a range of colors that add to the city's lively atmosphere. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static architecture. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and colors of the cityscape.
